tool.name: Molecule recognition
tool.command:
## OSRA_DATA_FILES is set during the toolshed Installation ## if it is not set, use the standard configuration and hope the best osra.py -f $oformat $infile -l \$OSRA_DATA_FILES/spelling.txt -a \$OSRA_DATA_FILES/superatom.txt
## further additions of OSRA parameter should go after -l and -a ## because -l and -a can be removed by the python wrapper
$confidence $adaptive $thinning
> $outfile

param.name: adaptive
param.label: Adaptive thresholding pre-processing, useful for low light/low contrast images (-i)

param.name: thinning
param.label: Additional thinning/scaling down of low quality documents (-j)

tool.help:
**What it does**
OSRA detects molecules in images and converts them to standard molecule formats.
